actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Reported to House from the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries with amendment, H. Rept. 96-13.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation, S. Rept. 96-58.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that "Our American Merchant Marine March" as written and composed by Earl W. Clark be recognized as the official march of the American Merchant Marine.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries with amendment, H. Rept. 96-13) Declares it the sense of Congress that "Our Merchant Marine March" as written and composed by Earl W. Clark shall be recognized as the official march of the American merchant marine.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that "Our American Merchant Marine March" as written and composed by Earl W. Clark be recognized as the official march of the American Merchant Marine.
